name: Starblast Map Editor
description: Create and edit custom Starblast Maps, easy to use.

name: Starblast Ship Mod Export / Code Converters
description: A tool to convert Ship Mod Export code to some other text/codes.

name: Ship Tree Path Finder
description: A tool to find path to a specific ship.

name: Starblast Modding Space Mods - Live Statistics
description: Live statistics of Modding Space mods in Starblast.

name: Starblast ECP Icon Viewer
description: Image gallery of all ecp icons in Starblast, also the place to test your custom icon.

name: Timer
description: This code snippet allows you to display a clean timer.
code: const timer = { seconds: 60, component: { id: "Timer", position: [43.5, 1, 20, 10], visible: true, components: [{ type: "text", position: [5, 0, 60, 60], value: "", color: "#CDE" }] } }; this.tick = function(game) { if (game.step % 60 === 0) { if (timer.seconds > 0) { timer.seconds--; timer.component.components[0].value = Math.round(timer.seconds / 60) + ":" + timer.seconds % 60; game.setUIComponent(timer.component); } else if (timer.seconds <= 0) { /* Do something */ } } };

name: Map Generator
description: This code snippet allows you to generate a randomly filled map.
code: var map_Generator=function(size,empty,asteroidSizeMax){var cells_number=size*size;var filled_cells_goal=cells_number-Math.round(cells_number*empty/100);var empty_cells_goal=cells_number-filled_cells_goal;var filled_cells_count=0;var empty_cells_count=0;var map=[];for(let i=0;i<size;i++){for(let j=0;j<size;j++){if(getRandomInt(cells_number)<empty_cells_goal){map.push(' ');empty_cells_count=empty_cells_count+1;}else{map.push(`${getRandomArbitrary(1,asteroidSizeMax)}`);filled_cells_count=filled_cells_count+1;}}map.push('\n');}return map.join('');};var map=map_Generator(80,60,9);

name: Prevent Upgrade Shortcuts
description: This code snippet allows you to remove the upgrades shortcuts

name: Reset Button
description: Reset your ship to the initial vessel of the ship tree.
code: var reset_button = { id: "reset", position: [5,30,8,14], clickable: true, shortcut: "R", visible: true, components: [{ type: "box",position:[0,0,100,100],stroke:"#CDE",width:2}, { type: "text",position:[10,35,80,30],value:"RESET",color:"#CDE"}, { type: "text",position:[20,70,60,20],value:"[R]",color:"#CDE"} ]}; var resetShip = function(ship) { ship.set({type:101, crystals: 20}); }; this.tick = function(game) { if (game.step%60===0) { for (var i=0;i<game.ships.length;i++) { var ship = game.ships[i]; if (!ship.custom.reset_button_installed) { ship.custom.reset_button_installed = true; ship.setUIComponent(reset_button); } } } }; this.event = function(event,game) { switch (event.name) { case "ui_component_clicked": var ship = event.ship; var component = event.id; if (component == "reset") { resetShip(ship); } break; } };

name: Terminal Player List
description: Returns a list of all the players of the running game.
code: game.modding.commands.list=function(){echo("\nList of players and their IDs:");for(let ship of game.ships){echo(ship.id+": "+ship.name);echo("\n");}};

name: Kick a player
description: Kick annoying players from your game.
code: game.modding.commands.kick=function(req){let args=req.trimStart().replace(/\s+/," ").split(" "),id=Number(args[1]||"NaN");if(isNaN(id))game.modding.terminal.error("Please specify an id to kick");else{let ship=game.findShip(id);if(!ship)game.modding.terminal.error("Requested ship not found!");else{try{ship.gameover({"Info":"You've been kicked by the map host","Reason":args.slice(2,args.length).join(" ")||"No reason has been provided"});echo("Ship with id "+id+" was kicked");}catch(e){game.modding.terminal.error("An error occured while kicking the requested ship!");}}}}

name: Subspace Detector
description: This code helps you allow or disallow subspace in your mod
code:
const Subspace_allow = true;function Subspace_Detector(ship){if(Subspace_allow){if(!ship.custom.cheater){game.modding.terminal.echo("[[g;#AA00FF;]Subspace alert:]
[[g;#ff0000;][[g;#F9D800;]"+ship.name+"] has been caught using Subspace.
[[g;#F9D800;]"+ship.name+"] has not been kicked as Subspace is allowed by map host.");ship.custom.cheater=true;}}else{ship.set({type:101,vx:0,vy:0,idle:true,collider:false});ship.gameover({"You have been caught using Subspace":" ","If you want to play, come without Subspace":" "});game.modding.terminal.echo("[[g;#AA00FF;]Subspace alert:]
[[g;#ff0000;][[g;#F9D800;]"+ship.name+"] has been caught using Subspace.
[[g;#F9D800;]"+ship.name+"] has been kicked as Subspace is not allowed by map host.");}this.event=function(event){const ship=event.ship;switch(event.name){case "ui_component_clicked":if(event.id==="using_subspace"){Subspace_Detector(ship);}break;}};}

name: Modding console cleaner
description: This code can remove lines like "(Tick CPU time: average 0 ms ; max 0 ms, Data sent: 0 bytes per second)" from the modding console.

name: Set custom text color
description: This code lets you customize the text color of the modding console.
